text: 4|7|samreab borsa ku ttuol ban chamnek ampi keromorotk del aupouk  mdeay ning sachsalohet ban bansaoltouk .  haey samreab sdrei ka  ttuol ban chamnek pi keromorotk del aupoukamdeay  ning sachsalohet  ban bansaoltouk der  tohbeicha keromorotk noh tech ryy chraen kadaoy .  vea chea chamnek del ban kamnt .
